title: gossip magazine from the 50s
content:
Hi, anyone know what font this is? I ran it through 'what the font' and no match.

Thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017023233im_/http:/typophile.com/files/250px-Conf54-11_nov-54_5194.JPG)
author: laniblaze

comments.content: [Filmotype Ginger](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017023233/http:/www.ms-studio.com/FontSales/ginger.html) is close (although a bit bolder), if you lengthen the ascenders and the C.
